definitions.body: comely, beautiful, of woman Ct So 1:5, So 6:4 (‖[[יׇפָה]]) of face So 2:14 ([[מַרְאֶה]]) so [[נׇוׇה]] Je 6:2 (fig. of Jerus.; ‖[[מְעֻנׇּגׇה]]); of mouth Ct So 4:3 (‖[[שְׂפָתוֹת]]).
seemly, of praise [[תְּהִלָּה]] Ps 33:1, Ps 147:1; subj. [[שְׂפַת־יֶתֶר]] Pr 17:7 (cf. Ct So 4:3); [[תַּעֲנוּג]] Pr 19:10; [[כָּבוֹד]] Pr 26:1. So also Ps 93:5 Mass. (anom. fem.) v. [[[נאה]]] supr.
